name: The Battle of Light and Dark
name_original: The Battle of Light and Dark
description:
This game is very early in development and does not represent the final product at all.

Currently, I am not amazing at programming but I am improving. This is my first step to creating something great in the future.

"Attempt to dodge the sunlight and don't get lit up, adapt to the movements and dodge them for as long as you can".

Feel free to criticise but I would like you to know that I had never done something like this before.

Bugs I am aware of:

  • UI Scaling (things looking too big or small - e.g. Game Over screen.)
  • Particles being in front of character
  • Spawnpoint very close to player

Roadmap:

  • Bigger map
  • More levels
  • More variants of 'lights'
  • Boss fights
  • Particles (NEXT UPDATE)
  • Audio (NEXT UPDATE)
  • Main menu
  • Redesign of Game Over screen
  • Art overhaul
  • Storyline
  • Online multiplayer?
  • Local multiplayer
  • Highscores (NEXT UPDATE)

This game will be updated as time goes on. Next possible scheduled update: 30/10/18
